dcterms:creator: J. Schler
M. Koppel
S. Argamon
J. Pennebaker
dcterms:description: A dataset containing blog articles used for gender classification. It includes 19,320 blog articles, with 5,000 randomly selected for experiments.
dcterms:title: Blog Dataset

dcterms:creator: V. Metsis
I. Androutsopoulos
G. Paliouras
dcterms:description: A dataset used for spam classification, combining sections of Spam and Ham emails from the Enron corpus. It includes 5,000 emails selected for experiments.
dcterms:title: Enron Spam Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Pang
L. Lee
S. Vaithyanathan
dcterms:description: A dataset containing movie reviews used for sentiment classification. It includes 2,000 reviews labeled as positive or negative.
dcterms:title: Movie Review Dataset
